mapper.select: SELECT emp.emp_number, emp.name, emp.phone, r.rank_name, emp.photo, dep.dep_name FROM employee emp, department_info dep, rank_info r WHERE emp.emp_number = #{emp_number} AND emp.dep_number = dep.dep_number AND emp.rank_code = r.rank_code
SELECT emp.emp_number, emp.password, aut.role FROM employee emp, authority aut WHERE emp_number = #{emp_number} AND emp.aut_number = aut.aut_number
